about_the_game:
The Star Wars™ Pinball: The Last Jedi™ pack offers two beautifully crafted pinball tables based on the latest installment of the Star Wars™ saga. Play through dozens of thrilling game modes based on key moments from the movie, with action featuring Luke Skywalker, Rey, Finn, Chewbacca, R2-D2, BB-8 and Captain Phasma—even Porgs!
- Jump the ramp to shoot down TIE fighters—plus Kylo Ren's TIE Silencer!
- It’s BB-8 to the rescue! Hijack the First Order's walker aboard Snoke’s command ship to defeat stormtroopers in a unique third-person shooter minigame
- Train Rey on Ahch-To—learn lightsaber fighting, and capture pinballs with the Force
- Experience life on Ahch-To with Luke Skywalker
- Let the Force guide you in a multiball mode…with lights turned off!
- Power up the Millennium Falcon to start a frantic multiball mode
- Reminisce as R2-D2 shares memories with Luke as hologram projections
- It’s Chewie versus Porgs! Who wins?
detailed_description:
The Star Wars™ Pinball: The Last Jedi™ pack offers two beautifully crafted pinball tables based on the latest installment of the Star Wars™ saga. Play through dozens of thrilling game modes based on key moments from the movie, with action featuring Luke Skywalker, Rey, Finn, Chewbacca, R2-D2, BB-8 and Captain Phasma—even Porgs!
- Jump the ramp to shoot down TIE fighters—plus Kylo Ren's TIE Silencer!
- It’s BB-8 to the rescue! Hijack the First Order's walker aboard Snoke’s command ship to defeat stormtroopers in a unique third-person shooter minigame
- Train Rey on Ahch-To—learn lightsaber fighting, and capture pinballs with the Force
- Experience life on Ahch-To with Luke Skywalker
- Let the Force guide you in a multiball mode…with lights turned off!
- Power up the Millennium Falcon to start a frantic multiball mode
- Reminisce as R2-D2 shares memories with Luke as hologram projections
- It’s Chewie versus Porgs! Who wins?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTS 450 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card / integrated

short_description: It's time to play Star Wars™ Pinball: The Last Jedi™! Revisit Luke Skywalker and Rey on Ahch-To Island, and help the Resistance survive the First Order. Relive movie scenes as unique pinball action on these two beautifully crafted pinball tables!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
